Description: Data from the Panda Gaming Grove, adapted for the Steps project

Knacks.Name: Smarter Than the Average Bear Spirit

Ranks.Effect: The wearer gains the Astrally Filtered Spectral Lenses ability. The wearer reduces the Difficulty Modifier to astral sensing from corruption by one region type (e.g., Corrupt to Tainted) until the end of the next round.

The wearer gains the Astrally Filtered Spectral Lenses ability. The wearer reduces the Difficulty Modifier to astral sensing from corruption by one region type (e.g., Corrupt to Tainted) until the end of the next round.
As a Free Action, the wearer gains a +2 to a test against a target’s Mystic Defense; the wearer must have astrally sensed the target. If the test uses the spell stored in the goggles’ spell matrix, it does not cost Strain.

The wearer gains the Astrally Filtered Spectral Lenses ability. The wearer reduces the Difficulty Modifier to astral sensing from corruption by one region type (e.g., Corrupt to Tainted) until the end of the next round.
As a Free Action, the wearer gains a +2 to a test against a target’s Mystic Defense; the wearer must have astrally sensed the target. If the test uses the spell stored in the goggles’ spell matrix, it does not cost Strain.

The wearer gains the Astrally Filtered Spectral Lenses ability. The wearer reduces the Difficulty Modifier to astral sensing from corruption by two region type (e.g., Corrupt to Tainted) until the end of the next round.
As a Free Action, the wearer gains a +4 to a test against a target’s Mystic Defense; the wearer must have astrally sensed the target. If the test uses the spell stored in the goggles’ spell matrix, it does not cost Strain.

The owner may choose one of their talents and receive a tattoo using the new tool they crafted. This tattoo is somehow representative of the talent. The owner takes 1 permanent Blood Magic Damage, and can spend 1 Strain to spend an additional Karma Point on tests using the selected talent. The owner cannot receive multiple tattoos to replicate this effect and the selected talent cannot be changed.
